definition: to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days

sentences.english: In ancient times it was etiquette to present your full-size visiting card when giving someone a gift.
sentences.chinese: 古時候，送禮物時附上自己的名帖，是一種禮儀。

sentences.english: The current leaders are just like those from ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 現在的領導人就跟來自古時候一樣。

sentences.english: In ancient times, warriors fought on horses.
sentences.chinese: 在古時候，武士都騎在馬上作戰。

sentences.english: In ancient times the messages were relayed from one place to another.
sentences.chinese: 古時候信息是用接力的方式從一地傳送到另一地。

sentences.english: In ancient China, etiquette for funerals was set by the emperor.
sentences.chinese: 喪禮在中國古時候是由皇帝制定的。

sentences.english: People in ancient times spent a fortune on elixirs for fear of dying.
sentences.chinese: 古時候的人因爲怕死，因此花很多錢在長生不老藥。

sentences.english: In ancient times, the Great Wall fortified China against barbarian invasions.
sentences.chinese: 古時候，長城保衛着中國，使之免遭蠻夷的入侵。

sentences.english: In ancient times, people didn't cook on this day and only cold food was served.
sentences.chinese: 在古時候，這一天人們不事炊火，只能喫冷食。

sentences.english: In ancient times the rulers ran copper or silver into coins.
sentences.chinese: 古時候統治者把銅或銀鑄成錢幣。

sentences.english: In ancient times, there was an old man named Yu Gong. He was nearly 90 years old.
sentences.chinese: 古時候，有一老人，名字叫愚公，快九十歲了。

sentences.english: In ancient times there was a country magistrate who took bribes and practised graft.
sentences.chinese: 古時候有一個縣官，貪污受賄，謀取私利。

sentences.english: How can I imagine that it was the Holy Land for Incan people in the ancient time?
sentences.chinese: 叫我如何想象古時候這裏曾是印加人的聖地？

sentences.english: Of the wind instruments, the flutes made of bamboo have remained as simple in construction as they were in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 在吹奏樂器中，竹笛的結構還是同古時候一樣簡單。

sentences.english: This was the ancient time when the lamb laid beside the lion and the little child led them.
sentences.chinese: 這就是古時候，小羊羔趴在獅子旁邊，小孩引導他們。

sentences.english: Zhang Heng is a man of ancient time.
sentences.chinese: 張衡是古時候的一個人。

sentences.english: In ancient times, Sichuan was called Shu Kingdom, and the transportation wasn’t good at that time.
sentences.chinese: 古時候，四川成爲蜀國，交通十分不便。
